commitResults.messageTitle: Add Bobby.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Add greet() which prints out the default greeting message.
Add exit() which prints out the default exit message.
Remove DUKE from the source code
Rename the file to Bobby.java

commitResults.messageTitle: Add feature to continuously prompt and echo user input
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement a loop in the main method to prompt the user for input and echoes the input.
Add a condition to exit the loop when the user types "bye".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add list feature to the chatbot
commitResults.messageBody:
Implement the ability to store user entered inputs to a fixed size array
Add a 'list' command to display all tasks in the order they were added.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task class and feature to mark and unmark tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Add tasks class to encapsulate functions and fields for tasks
Add feature to mark and unmark tasks based on the task number in the array

commitResults.messageTitle: Create new Task subtypes
commitResults.messageBody: Add feature to add different tasks including Deadline, Todo and Event.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Automated text ui testing for Bobby
Add custom exceptions to Bobby
commitResults.messageBody:
Handle invalid list number when marking and unmarking.
Handle invalid todo, deadline and event inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add delete feature to list
commitResults.messageBody: Add exceptions for delete feature.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add enums.
commitResults.messageBody:
Add enums that include all the commands for Bobby.
Update the main function.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add feature to write inputs to a data file and read from the data file when program starts.
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, there is no feature to save inputs from users.

Having this feature makes it more user friendly as users do not have to manually input their tasks every time the program runs.

Save the data from the user input as [Task type] | [IsDone] | [Task Name] to make it easier to query the data. For Event and Deadline data, they have additional columns to store the deadline date and the event from and to data respectively.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
commitResults.messageBody:
* branch-Level-7:
  Add feature to write inputs to a data file and read from the data file when program starts.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change dates from String to LocalDate
commitResults.messageBody: Add feature in Bobby to parse date string inputs and convert it to a LocalDate in each Task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new FIND command that finds for tasks based on the user input date.
Merge branch 'branch-Level-8'
commitResults.messageBody:
* branch-Level-8:
  Add new FIND command that finds for tasks based on the user input date.
  Change dates from String to LocalDate

commitResults.messageTitle: Create new classes to abstract out logic in Bobby class.
commitResults.messageBody:
Ui class to handle all interactions with users.
Storage class to handle loading and saving of data to the Bobby.txt file.
Parser class to handle user inputs.
TaskList class to maintain the lists of tasks and provide method to add, remove and update tasks status.
Remove the echo function in Bobby as it is not used.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Bobby class to use the other classes.
commitResults.messageBody:
Abstract logic in Bobby class to other classes.
Update Bobby class to use the other classes. This makes the code easier to read and change in the future.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Bobby class to use the other classes.
commitResults.messageBody: Added the data file to the gitignore.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-MoreOOP'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-MoreOOP:
  Update Bobby class to use the other classes.
  Create new classes to abstract out logic in Bobby class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add packages for bobby, command, exceptions, parser, storage, tasklist and tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously all the files were stored under main/java. However, this was very messy as more classes are added.

Add packages to group related classes together to make the code neater.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-Packages'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-Packages:
  Add packages for bobby, command, exceptions, parser, storage, tasklist and tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'add-gradle-support'
commitResults.messageBody:
* add-gradle-support:
  build.gradle: Prevent generating a second JAR file
  Bump gradle and lib version
  Add Gradle support

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit tests.
commitResults.messageBody:
Unit testing can help to ensure that each function in each class is working correctly.

Lets add unit testing for the storage and parser class to test the methods inside.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-JUnit'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-JUnit:
  Add JUnit tests.

commitResults.messageTitle: Package app as a jar file.
Merge branch 'A-Jar'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-Jar:
  Package app as a jar file.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add javadoc header to all non private functions.
Add javadoc headers to all classes
Edit switch indentations to comply with coding standards
Add function to find a task by date and keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously there was a function to find task by date only. To make the search more effective, we can add a function to find by keyword as well.

Add FINDDATE and FINDKEY commands to the Command enum.
Implement findTasksByDate and findTasksByKeyword methods in the Parser class.
Update parseFindCommand in Parser to handle both finddate and findkey commands.
Modify Bobby class to integrate handling of FINDDATE and FINDKEY commands and update the run method accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-JavaDoc'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-JavaDoc:
  Add javadoc headers to all classes
  Add javadoc header to all non private functions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-CodingStandard'
commitResults.messageBody:
* A-CodingStandard:
  Edit switch indentations to comply with coding standards

- Refactor Ui class to improve code cleanliness and maintainability
